data.lyric:
[ti:Weather the Storm (Explicit)]
[ar:Meek Mill/Lil Baby/DJ Khaled]
[al:Father Of Asahd (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Weather the Storm (Explicit) - Meek Mill (米克·米尔)/Lil Baby (Dominique Jones)/DJ Khaled (DJ哈立德)
[00:00.36]Lyrics by：Khaled Khaled/Robert Williams/Dominique Jones/Nicholas Warwar/Tarik Azzouz/Alec Costandinos/Michel Jouveaux
[00:00.73]Composed by：Khaled Khaled/Robert Williams/Dominique Jones/Nicholas Warwar/Tarik Azzouz/Alec Costandinos/Michel Jouveaux
[00:01.10]DJ Khaled/Meek Mill：
[00:01.21]We The Best Music
[00:02.91]2019 we ain't taking no shorts unless we going on vacation Big fish
[00:08.74]Another one
[00:10.08]Uh
[00:10.93]DJ Khaled
[00:12.41]Meek Mill：
[00:12.68]Drop top gone
[00:13.32]Drop top gone
[00:13.94]Selling popcorn
[00:14.73]Selling popcorn
[00:15.54]I went from licks to most wanted to the top of the Forbes
[00:18.59]F**ked up the trenches
[00:19.34]F**ked up the trenches
[00:20.13]I weather the storm
[00:20.97]Weather that s**t
[00:21.65]Young living legend I be on that s**t that these n***as ain't on
[00:24.03]N***as ain't on
[00:24.90]I went to war with the system
[00:26.09]Yeah
[00:26.44]To give my son toys on Christmas
[00:27.69]Yeah
[00:28.03]Probably won't give me no Grammy
[00:29.25]Give me that
[00:29.62]Putting awards on wrists
[00:30.81]Yeah
[00:31.16]We had to kill just to make it out s**t we puttin' rewards on n***as
[00:34.07]Brrt
[00:34.47]Live by the gun and we die about it s**t
[00:35.97]I'm praying the sword don't kill us
[00:37.56]Praying the Lord forgive us we going to war with killers
[00:40.59]They put a bounty all on my dawgs want 'em dead by morning n***a
[00:43.80]We took risks to live like this ain't doing consignment
[00:46.25]Doing consignment
[00:47.00]I brought my mama tears and I turned 'em to VVS diamonds
[00:49.41]VVS diamonds
[00:50.16]I know you see me on top of my game ain't see me declining
[00:53.29]Turned to a monster the next time you saw me you seen I was climbing
[00:55.75]Seen I was climbing
[00:56.53]They took my elevator I said f**k it I'm taking the steps
[00:58.80]Taking the steps
[00:59.59]Got me on bail they want me in jail they say I'm a threat
[01:01.96]Say I'm a threat
[01:02.83]Fighting for freedom 11 years they been taking my breath
[01:05.24]Taking my breath
[01:05.95]Watching the feds taking pictures it been making me stress
[01:08.27]Makin' me sweat
[01:09.08]Tapping my phone taking my rights and making 'em wrong
[01:12.26]Deep in this s**t
[01:12.91]Had to dance with the devil to make it back home yeah
[01:15.71]Lil Baby：
[01:16.45]I got a call from one of the dawgs say you been riding private
[01:19.44]He say I should tell the pilot to come and get him
[01:21.98]And the crazy part about it my n***a sitting in a prison
[01:25.12]And the other crazy part about it I really know that feeling yeah
[01:29.47]I can't put my trust inside the system
[01:31.48]Gotta be here for my sisters
[01:32.99]And my niece believe in Christmas
[01:34.82]And her dad somebody killed him
[01:36.21]Some s**t I don't remember
[01:37.83]'Cause I left him in a box when they had me in them locks
[01:40.99]I blame God for my convictions
[01:42.48]Never give a judge that ammunition
[01:44.60]Never had no codefendants
[01:46.09]God gon' be my only witness
[01:47.80]Never take it personal it's whatever when we handling business
[01:50.79]We been through the worst them situations we can never mention
[01:54.06]You gon' have your mom losing her mind if you get a conviction
[01:57.10]Got some homies sitting in the feds hope they get an eviction
[02:00.26]Praying to his gun he got his fire he ain't got no religion
[02:03.35]I heard Meek got 2 for a wheelie and I was in the kitchen serving
[02:07.09]Had me thinking is it all worth it
[02:09.75]Thinking 'bout the chances that I took to buy you purses
[02:12.79]Thinking 'bout them licks that we went on and just go splurge it
[02:16.07]Switched it up and everything been working
data.trans:
[ti:Weather the Storm (Explicit)]
[ar:Meek Mill/Lil Baby/DJ Khaled]
[al:Father Of Asahd (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.36]//
[00:00.73]//
[00:01.10]//
[00:01.21]We The Best Music出品
[00:02.91]2019年 我们不走捷径 除非是要去度假
[00:08.74]又一首好歌
[00:10.08]//
[00:10.93]//
[00:12.41]//
[00:12.68]敞篷跑车开起来
[00:13.32]敞篷跑车开起来
[00:13.94]贩卖爆米花
[00:14.73]贩卖爆米花
[00:15.54]我从一无所有到现在荣登《福布斯》富人榜榜首
[00:18.59]震惊了整个贫民区
[00:19.34]震惊了整个贫民区
[00:20.13]我经受住了狂风暴雨
[00:20.97]经受住了磨难
[00:21.65]活生生的传奇人物 我的实力是这些家伙无法企及的
[00:24.03]他们无法企及
[00:24.90]我与这个体制顽强对抗
[00:26.09]//
[00:26.44]只是为了给我儿子买圣诞礼物
[00:27.69]//
[00:28.03]他们可能不会给我格莱美奖
[00:29.25]给我颁奖
[00:29.62]把奖品戴在手腕上
[00:30.81]//
[00:31.16]为了生存 我们必须杀戮 我们在惩罚别人
[00:34.07]//
[00:34.47]不论生死 我们都必须紧握武器
[00:35.97]但愿我们能好好活着
[00:37.56]但愿上帝能原谅我们 我们与杀手共赴战场
[00:40.59]他们悬赏我兄弟的人头 想让他们活不过明天
[00:43.80]这样的生活 我们冒了很大的险 必须亲力亲为
[00:46.25]不能指望别人
[00:47.00]我让妈妈流下了眼泪 我把眼泪变成晶莹的钻石
[00:49.41]晶莹的钻石
[00:50.16]我知道你眼中的我处于行业巅峰 没看见我落魄的时候
[00:53.29]变成了怪物 下次你见到我 你会看见我攀上更高的地方
[00:55.75]看见我攀上更高的地方
[00:56.53]他们毁了我的电梯 我说 去他的 我靠双脚也要走上去
[00:58.80]靠双脚走上去
[00:59.59]我被保释出来 他们想要我蹲在牢里 他们说我是个危险人物
[01:01.96]说我是个危险人物
[01:02.83]十一年来一直为自由而战 我已经疲倦到快要窒息
[01:05.24]疲倦到快要窒息
[01:05.95]看着警察拍照 让我觉得不安
[01:08.27]我不停流汗
[01:09.08]翻我的手机 剥夺我的权利 冤枉好人
[01:12.26]深陷其中
[01:12.91]为了回家 必须与恶魔共舞
[01:15.71]//
[01:16.45]我接到一个兄弟的电话 他说 你最近坐上了私人飞机
[01:19.44]他说我应该叫飞行员去接他过来
[01:21.98]最扯的地方是 我的兄弟蹲在监狱里呢
[01:25.12]另一个很扯的地方是 我真的明白那种感受
[01:29.47]我不能相信这个体制
[01:31.48]必须帮助我的姐妹
[01:32.99]我侄女还期待着圣诞节
[01:34.82]她的爸爸被人杀害了
[01:36.21]有些事情我不记得了
[01:37.83]因为那时候我正好被他们关了进去
[01:40.99]我的罪过都是上帝的错
[01:42.48]永远不要招惹法官
[01:44.60]从来没有同谋
[01:46.09]上帝是我唯一的证人
[01:47.80]不要有私人情感 生意就只是生意
[01:50.79]我们经历了最苦难的时光 那些情形我们不愿再提
[01:54.06]如果你被判罪了 你的妈妈会疯掉
[01:57.10]有些兄弟正在被警察盘问 但愿他们能逃过一劫
[02:00.26]他对着枪祈祷 他有激情 但他不信教
[02:03.35]听说Meek Mill因为街头飙车被判了两年 当时我正在餐厅做服务员
[02:07.09]这让我不禁思考 这样值得吗
[02:09.75]想到我为了给你买包冒了多大的险
[02:12.79]想到我们赚这么多钱 就是为了肆意挥霍
[02:16.07]做出改变 人生就有了很大的起色
